description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Can you shoot all the moths without breaking the globes? MothBallz gives you 14 balls to unlock, each with unique dynamics; 45 testing levels, including Time Trials and KillAll frenzies; a game progression designed to maximize replay value; and that satisfied feeling you can only get from crushing a ton of bugs.

MothBallz gives you 14 balls to unlock, each with unique dynamics; 45 testing levels, including Time Trials and KillAll frenzies; a game progression designed to maximize replay value; and that satisfied feeling you can only get from crushing a ton of bugs.
